RM.recommendation: Monitor closely for toxicity. Consider alternative analgesic if adverse effects occur.

IM.recommendation: Reduced analgesic response possible. Consider alternative opioid if ineffective.

PM.recommendation: Avoid codeine due to lack of efficacy. Use morphine or non-opioid alternatives.

IM.recommendation: Reduced antiplatelet effect possible. Consider alternative therapy such as prasugrel or ticagrelor.

PM.recommendation: Avoid clopidogrel. Use alternative P2Y12 inhibitor such as prasugrel or ticagrelor.

PM.recommendation: Significant dose reduction required. High bleeding risk. Consider alternative anticoagulant.

IM.recommendation: Limit simvastatin dose to <20 mg/day or consider alternative statin.

PM.recommendation: Avoid simvastatin due to high myopathy risk. Use pravastatin or rosuvastatin.

PM.recommendation: Reduce starting dose by ~90% or use alternative non-thiopurine therapy.
